attributes.action: allow Churches to move into areas earmarked for employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Among other things, Churches employ people and are of great benefit to the local community.
However, expanding Churches are coming up against difficulties when trying to move into premises that are 'earmarked for employment'.

(Look up BBC News articles "Faithful 'crammed into churches'" and "No room at the inn?" for examples.)

Therefore, we the undersigned are asking that planning permission laws are amended to allow Churches to move into buildings 'earmarked for employment'.
